divs: sighting detailswhile driving east bound, up a short hill i had to lower my sun visor to block the sun as it was early morning and i was driving eastbound. i noticed the object in the sky to the left of the sun. at first i thought a small bit of bird [profanity deleted\cms\tg] was on my side glass. i double checked and there was nothing on my window. the object was the color of a white cloud but was shaped very differently. the bottom was squared off and the sides were straight. in the middle of the bottom there seemed to be a dark spot, i looked at this part of it more intensely to be sure. the top end kind of tapered off and had a wispyness to it. i stopped driving to take a closer look at it. the place where i stopped was next to a large tree. i was looking over my left shoulder to see the object. i kinda disregarded it after a while. almost took a cellphone pic of it but decided it was too far away to get anything decent. it was about 10 miles away. as i pulled away from where i stopped, the large tree blocked my view of the object. i looked again to where it should have been and it was gone. i then looked forward and there it was, still about 10 miles away but now it moved 90 degrees clockwise through the sky. that startled me. i kept driving on and soon lost sight of the object.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Oceanside
There were no other sightings in Oceanside on or around November 11th 2010
Summary: in clear blue sky a white upright cylindrical object with a dark spot in the center of the bottom was noticed
